data.name: Hyde's Haunt & Seek
data.detailed_description:
Spook or be spooked in this team-based party game. Set in a haunted manor, the mortal Seekers search for a Prized Possession, playing against a team of pranking poltergeists dead set on keeping it to themselves.

It’s a parlor game from beyond the grave, where each side has a particular role to play--

MORTAL SEEKERS:

Search the dark rooms of Hyde Manor and fend off ghostly gags with the aid of a Spectral Flashlight:
- Catch ‘em in the act with a Blast Pulse: scattering ghosts’ energy powers your flashlight and illuminates the path to the object
- Find hidden ghosts using your nightstick: a blacklight mode that illuminates traces in neon glow
- Extract them from furniture using the Exorcism Beam
- During a Haunt, your nightstick acts as a baton to hit ghosts - swing wisely!


PRANKING POLTERGEISTS:

Spook the mortal Seekers, but don’t get caught!
- Fly through walls and rooms, or possess furniture to hide and move undetected
- Levitate nearby objects using psychokinetic power: this will scare the living “daylights” out of them!
- Collect the living “daylights” to fill your Team Spirit meter: this will power your Haunt.
- Unleash your monstrous form: if you successfully attack during a Haunt, it’s an instant win/game over.


  • A Playground of Fears: Ever wanted to play as the ghost and scare your friends? Hyde’s Haunt & Seek combines team based spooking with first person horror games, providing an immersive experience on either side.
  • Face Your Fears, Your Way: As the Seeker, our spooky filter allows you to adjust the game’s fear factor to your own comfort level
  • Co-op Multiplayer: Play alongside or against your friends in team based play with light competition (currently Ghost mode only, with Seeker compatibility coming soon.)
  • Cross Platform (coming soon!): Support all players across PC, mobile and even VR.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
